execute-actions.subject: Your Account
execute-actions.messageBody: We have just created your {realmName} account.
execute-actions.messageLink: Please set your initial password by clicking on the link below. {link}
execute-actions.resetPassword: If the link has already expired, try to reset you password with your email at our login page.
execute-actions.furtherActions: If you have any questions or think you are the wrong person receiving this email, please reach out to {contactEmail} for help.

email-test.messageBody: This is a test email from {realmName}
